entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as eagerly awaiting her Daily Prophet. She is described as not the only person waiting for news about the escaped Death Eaters.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a source of news about the escaped Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as having escaped and being eagerly awaited to be caught.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as helping himself to orange juice and receiving a note from the owl.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is mentioned as the location where Harry and Hermione are having breakfast.

entities.name: hogwarts school
entities.description: Hogwarts School is mentioned as the institution that Harry attends.

relationships.description: Hermione also has a Daily Prophet.
Harry is concerned about the escaped Death Eaters.
Hermione is also concerned about the escaped Death Eaters.
Harry is located in the Great Hall.
Hermione is also located in the Great Hall.
Harry is a student at Hogwarts School.
Hermione is also a student at Hogwarts School.
